sectionTitle: Best Actor in a Leading Role
pgTitle: List of black Academy Award winners and nominees
tableCaption: Best Actor in a Leading Role

tableData.tdHtmlString: First black actor to be nominated for Best Actor.
tableData.text: First black actor to be nominated for Best Actor.

tableData.tdHtmlString: Lilies of the Field
First black actor to win Best Actor; First black actor to receive two acting nominations (Best Actor); Youngest black actor to win Best Actor (age 37).
tableData.text: First black actor to win Best Actor; First black actor to receive two acting nominations (Best Actor); Youngest black actor to win Best Actor (age 37).

tableData.tdHtmlString: The Great White Hope
First film to feature black nominees for both Best Actor and Best Actress.
tableData.text: First film to feature black nominees for both Best Actor and Best Actress.

tableData.tdHtmlString: First jazz musician to be nominated for Best Actor
tableData.text: First jazz musician to be nominated for Best Actor

tableData.tdHtmlString: What's Love Got to Do with It
tableData.text: What's Love Got to Do with It

surfaceLinks.surface: What's Love Got to Do with It

tableData.tdHtmlString: Second film to feature black nominees for both Best Actor and Best Actress.
tableData.text: Second film to feature black nominees for both Best Actor and Best Actress.

tableData.tdHtmlString: First black actor to receive five acting nominations overall; First black actor to receive three Best Actor nominations; Second black actor to win Best Actor; First time that multiple black actors received Best Actor nominations; Second oldest black actor to win Best Actor (age 47); First black actor to win two acting awards.
tableData.text: First black actor to receive five acting nominations overall; First black actor to receive three Best Actor nominations; Second black actor to win Best Actor; First time that multiple black actors received Best Actor nominations; Second oldest black actor to win Best Actor (age 47); First black actor to win two acting awards.

tableData.tdHtmlString: First male hip hop artist to be nominated for an Academy Award; First time that multiple black actors received Best Actor nominations.
tableData.text: First male hip hop artist to be nominated for an Academy Award; First time that multiple black actors received Best Actor nominations.

tableData.tdHtmlString: First black actor to receive two acting nominations in the same year;
tableData.text: First black actor to receive two acting nominations in the same year;

tableData.tdHtmlString: The Last King of Scotland
The Pursuit of Happyness
Denzel Washington has the most nominations for a black Actor; Best Actor (4 nominations) and Best Supporting Actor (2 nominations)
tableData.text: Denzel Washington has the most nominations for a black Actor; Best Actor (4 nominations) and Best Supporting Actor (2 nominations)
